section_summary: The text is a record of a meeting discussing the formation of a committee. The committee is proposed to consist of three members and will focus on environmental, food, and water security. Several individuals are nominated for the committee, including Hamdan Salem Al-Azmi, Abdullah Fahad Al-Anzi, Dr. Hamad Mohammed Al-Matar, Faisal Ghanem Al-Jamhour, and Dr. Badr Hamed Al-Mulla. The meeting also mentions the General Secretariat of the Council of the Nation recording the names of the committee members. The text is part of the seventeenth legislative session.
